availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Wynne (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, and Cincinnati, Ohio, merchant. Native of Wales Retired merchant in Cincinnati, Ohio, in 1850. Retired merchant in Kenton County in 1860. Employed Elizabeth Davis in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 6, p. 105A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, pp. 789-90.
Find A Grave, "William Wynne (1810-1904)," Memorial 158982594, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/158982594 (accessed March 31, 2020).
